TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyStore extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: KeyStore is responsible for maintaining cryptographic keys and their owners.

remarks.para: KeyStore is responsible for maintaining cryptographic keys and their owners.
The type of the system key store can be changed by setting the 'keystore.type' property in the file named JAVA_HOME/lib/security/java.security.

Docs.summary: A constructor used when creating managed representations of JNI objects; called by the runtime.

remarks.para: This constructor is invoked by the runtime infrastructure () to create a new managed representation for a Java Native Interface object.
The constructor will initializes the property of the new instance using and .

MemberSignature.Value: public static string DefaultType { get; }
.property string DefaultType

Docs.summary: Returns the default type for KeyStore instances.

remarks.para: Returns the default type for KeyStore instances.
The default is specified in the 'keystore.type' property in the file named java.security properties file. If this property is not set, "jks" will be used.

Docs.param: the InputStream to load this KeyStore's data from or null.
the password to verify the stored data, maybe null.
Docs.summary: Initializes this KeyStore from the provided InputStream.

remarks.para: Initializes this KeyStore from the provided InputStream. Pass null as the stream argument to initialize an empty KeyStore or to initialize a KeyStore which does not rely on an InputStream. This KeyStore utilizes the given password to verify the stored data.

Docs.exception: if a problem occurred while reading from the stream.
if the required algorithm is not available.
if an exception occurred while loading the certificates of this KeyStore.

Docs.summary: Associates the given alias with a certificate.

remarks.para: Associates the given alias with a certificate.
If the specified alias already exists, it will be reassigned.

Docs.exception: if this KeyStore is not initialized, or an existing alias is not associated to an entry containing a trusted certificate, or this method fails for any other reason.
if alias is null.

Docs.param: the ProtectionParameter to protect the entry.
Docs.summary: Stores the given Entry in this KeyStore and associates the entry with the given alias.

remarks.para: Stores the given Entry in this KeyStore and associates the entry with the given alias. The entry is protected by the specified ProtectionParameter.
If the specified alias already exists, it will be reassigned.

Docs.exception: if this KeyStore is not initialized.
if alias is null or entry is null.

Docs.summary: Associates the given alias with a key and a certificate chain.

remarks.para: Associates the given alias with a key and a certificate chain.
If the specified alias already exists, it will be reassigned.
If this KeyStore is of type "jks", key must be encoded conform to the PKS#8 standard as an .

if key is a PrivateKey and chain does.
if alias is null.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override IntPtr ThresholdClass { get; }

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

MemberSignature.Value: protected override Type ThresholdType { get; }
.property instance class System.Type ThresholdType

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Type { get; }
.property instance string Type

Docs.summary: Returns the type of this KeyStore.

remarks.para: Returns the type of this KeyStore.
